text: Skazhi, o prorok, etim lyudyam, trebuyushchim u tebya priblizit' nakazaniye: "Ne moya zadacha nakazat' vas za vashi deyaniya. Ved' ya tol'ko uveshchevayu vas o nakazanii Allakha i peredayu vam Yego yasnoye preduprezhdeniye, a Allakh - Tot, u kotorogo v rukakh schot vashikh deyaniy i vozdayaniye za nikh
